name: updateInventoryForAnItem
description: Updates the inventory for a given item.

sku.description: An arbitrary alphanumeric unique ID, specified by the seller, which identifies each item. This will be used by the seller in the XSD file to refer to each item. Special characters in the sku needing encoding are: ':', '/', '?', '#', '[', ']', '@', '!', '$', '&', "'", '(', ')', '*', '+', ',', ';', '=', ‘ ’, '{', '}' as well as '%' itself if it's a part of sku. Make sure to encode space with %20. Other characters don't need to be encoded.

shipNode.description: The shipNode for which the inventory is to be updated.

WM_SEC.ACCESS_TOKEN.description: The access token retrieved in the Token API call

WM_CONSUMER.CHANNEL.TYPE.description: A unique ID to track the consumer request by channel. Use the Consumer Channel Type received during onboarding

WM_QOS.CORRELATION_ID.description: A unique ID which identifies each API call and used to track and debug issues; use a random generated GUID for this ID

quantity.description: Quantity that has been ordered by the customers but not yet shipped

sku.description: A seller-provided Product ID. Response will have decoded value.

$ul: **quantity**: Quantity that has been ordered by the customers but not yet shipped
